message: Name,

We wanted to remind you that registration for Digital and Traditional Marketing for Solo and Small Firms - From No Cost to Low Cost Effective, Practical, and Proven is now open to all Justia Connect members!

Join David Alan Wolf, Partner at Wood, Atter, & Wolf, P.A., on Friday, April 21 at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT for a free presentation designed to offer solo and small-firm lawyers specific strategies for promoting their brands and reaching more clients.
Save your seat to ensure you can take advantage of actionable insights to promote your law firmâ€™s growth.
